settings.heading: The Leading Supplier of Pest Management Solutions

settings.custom_liquid:
Quality

We provide the most comprehensive and superior quality pest control solutions, ensuring your utmost reliability.

Trust

Our team of experts comprehends your business challenges and is committed to offering customized solutions at each stage of your journey. By doing so, we aim to ensure the seamless and efficient operation of your business.

Innovation

Our unwavering dedication to revolutionizing pest management through cutting-edge innovations guarantees you access to the most effective tools available.

settings.custom_liquid: Why Customers Choose Us

settings.quote: We’ve sourced pesticide products from Ecovar for over a decade, and they consistently exceed expectations. Their quality, safety standards, and responsiveness set them apart in the UAE market. Ecovar is a trusted partner in helping us deliver reliable, professional pest control solutions. Highly recommended.
settings.author: Arun, Operations Manager ALLIED PEST CONTROL

settings.quote: Although Ecovar has been a key supplier for our company for years, I’ve only recently had the chance to work directly with Sajith — and it’s been fantastic. When we faced a critical supply need, he went above and beyond to ensure we got what we needed on time. Ecovar continues to be an outstanding pillar of support for our operations in the UAE.
settings.author: Engr. Faheem - Emirates Services

settings.quote: Good products, great support. Ecovar has helped us grow our customer base with consistent results. Highly recommended.
settings.author: Mr Ansil, Super Hygiene Abudhabi

settings.quote: We absolutely love working with Ecovar! Their products are consistently effective, and their customer support is second to none. For years, they’ve been more than just a supplier — they’ve been a true partner in helping us deliver outstanding pest control solutions. We’re proud to have them on our team.
settings.author: John, Riviera Services, Dubai.

settings.quote: I’ve worked with Ecovar for the past six years for both pesticides and equipment, and the experience has been outstanding. Beyond being a reliable supplier, Ecovar stands out for its deep product knowledge, consistent support, and exceptional service. The insights and guidance I’ve received have greatly contributed to my growth as an engineer. My reputation with clients is closely tied to the quality, reliability, and timely delivery of Ecovar products. It’s a partnership I value deeply.
settings.author: Charles Prabu, Trustco Pest Control & Cleaning Services
